title: Passport for a Corpse (Drama, 1962) Alberto Lupo, Hélène Chanel, Linda Christian | Movie

sources.title: Passport for a Corpse (Drama, 1962) Alberto Lupo, Hélène Chanel, Linda Christian | Movie
sources.description:
A thrilling chilling tale of crime and horror.
Criminal Maurizio attempts to rob a payroll van loaded with bank notes. After the shootout and desperate to escape, he hides in a coffin with hopes of crossing the French border. When he finally gets out of the coffin he finds himself locked in a morgue freezer with three dead bodies. While trying to escape the morgue and his isolation he slowly starts going mad and hallucinating.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/awddG3MKh0E

Original title: Lasciapassare per il morto (1962) AKA: Passport for a Corpse

Director: Mario Gariazzo
Writers: Gennard Arendo, Carlo Ferrero, Mario Gariazzo
Stars: Alberto Lupo, Hélène Chanel, Linda Christian
Genres: Italian cinema, Crime, Drama, Thriller

This film has English audio, and is subtitled in many languages.



@CultCinemaClassics 

Members-only videos https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA
